entry.title: Feds Update Tornado Cash Sanctions, Cite North Korea’s Nuclear Weapons Program
entry.summary: The Treasury Department today clarified its sanctions on the Ethereum coin mixer.

entry.title: FTX’s FTT Token Crashes 78% in 24 Hours, Bitcoin Hits Yearly Low
entry.summary: FTX’s token plunged nearly 80% following news that Binance would acquire Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto exchange.

entry.title: Bored Ape Founders Propose NFT Royalties Model, Decry OpenSea’s Stance as 'Not Great'
entry.summary: Yuga Labs’ founders rail against marketplaces that are rejecting creator royalties, suggesting a DAO-governed allowlist system.

entry.title: Kim Kardashian, Floyd Mayweather Set to Win Ethereum Max Lawsuit
entry.summary: The super rich celebs were sued in January for allegedly pumping and dumping an obscure Ethereum-based token.

entry.title: Binance CEO Promises to Implement ‘Proof of Reserves’ After Run on FTX
entry.summary: Changpeng “CZ” Zhao says the industry can’t simply say, "Trust me, bro."

entry.title: What Happens to FTX’s Gaming and NFT Biz If Binance Deal Goes Through?
entry.summary: FTX spent big on Web3 investments, gaming tech, and esports deals, but the future of those endeavors is now unclear.

entry.title: Kraken and Coinbase Suffer 'Connectivity Issues' Amid Market Crash
entry.summary: An already turbulent day in crypto found two major exchanges struggling to keep up with high volatility and demand.

entry.title: Crypto Twitter Reacts to Binance Acquiring FTX—In Memes
entry.summary: Binance CEO CZ is depicted as Obi-Wan Kenobi, Michael Scott, and Elon Musk. FTX CEO SBF fares less well.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana Swing Wildly as Market Reacts to Binance-FTX Bombshell
entry.summary: The market is experiencing a big sell-off as traders decide what to do with the big market-shifting news.

entry.title: FTT, BNB Prices Soar After Binance Agrees to Acquire FTX
entry.summary: A massive crypto industry move has reversed the FTX token’s collapse, with Binance’s token reaping benefits as well.

entry.title: Battle of Crypto Titans Ends: Binance to Acquire FTX
entry.summary: The news of Binance swallowing up its rival FTX shocked the crypto industry and prompted a flood of memes and market action.

entry.title: Ethereum-Based Prediction Market Shows Red Wave in US Midterms
entry.summary: One of Polymarket'ss most popular polls shows that the Ethereum-based prediction market's users are betting Republicans will win the midterms.

entry.title: NCSoft Plots Web3 Games on Sui After $15M Mysten Labs Investment
entry.summary: The firms plan to collaborate on Web3 games after NCSoft contributed to Mysten Labs' recent $300M Series B round.

entry.title: Twitter Won’t Go Web3 ‘Anytime Soon’: Aave CEO Stani Kulechov
entry.summary: Stani Kulechov believes that Web3 social media will be less of an update of Web2 and more of an interoperable network of new platforms.

entry.title: FTX Exchange's Token FTT Plummets Below $22 as Binance-Led Selling Continues
entry.summary: FTX’s native token has suffered as Binance began offloading large amounts of FTT as part of a new feud between the two exchanges.

entry.title: Wintermute-backed DeFi Exchange Bebop Now Live on Ethereum, Polygon
entry.summary: Alongside swift transaction speeds, Bebop's unique “many-to-one” token feature lets traders swap whole portfolios for one coin in one click.

entry.title: Over $344 Million Liquidated as Bitcoin, Ethereum Continue to Drop
entry.summary: It’s been a bearish day for cryptocurrencies as markets dropped nearly $48 billion in value ahead of the U.S. CPI report.

entry.title: Alameda Responds to BitDAO Allegation, Proves 100M BIT Token Holdings
entry.summary: Alameda satisfied BitDAO’s proof-of-funds request after crypto’s billion-dollar DAO questioned the sudden slump of its native token’s price.

entry.title: Dogecoin, SHIB Plummet as Crypto Market Sheds $44B Overnight
entry.summary: The ongoing feud between crypto titans may have rubbed off on the broader market, with Dogecoin and Shiba Inu hit badly.

entry.title: Paradigm Crypto Policy Council Enlists Paul Ryan Among Other D.C. Vets
entry.summary: Georgetown University's Chris Brummer will also serve as a senior advisor for the well-connected group.

entry.title: Binance CEO Declines Alameda's Bid to Buy His Company's FTX Tokens
entry.summary: CZ said he’ll stick with the “free market,” and denies allegations of a conspiracy against FTX.

entry.title: Buy an NFT, Get Maine Lobster Shipped to Your Door
entry.summary: OneOf and Get Maine Lobster team up for tokens that yield buyers seafood shipments, perks, and more.

entry.title: Get Ready for the 'Scourge': Inside Vitalik Buterin’s Updated Ethereum Plans
entry.summary: It’s not a zombie apocalypse—it’s a new part of Ethereum’s post-merge roadmap.

entry.title: Magic Eden CEO: Royalties-Enforcing NFTs Could Be 'New Asset Class'
entry.summary: The Solana-centric marketplace is pushing for NFTs with “special properties” to enforce creator royalties—but warns that they will have “trade-offs.”

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Dip Ahead of US Midterm, Inflation Updates
entry.summary: Bitcoin and other major cryptocurrencies have erased their weekend gains.

entry.title: LBRY Loses SEC Case, Calls Ruling a 'Dangerous Precedent' for Crypto
entry.summary: According to LBRY, the language in the court's ruling could make “every cryptocurrency in the US a security, including Ethereum.”

entry.title: Billions in Bitcoin Linked to Silk Road Seized by US Attorney’s Office
entry.summary: This is the DOJ's second-largest Bitcoin confiscation to date.

entry.title: Investors Withdraw Millions From FTX as Binance Begins Liquidating FTT Token
entry.summary: With weekly stablecoin outflows topping $451 million, investors appear to be taking their tokens off FTX just as Binance dumps its FTT.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Gemini Expands to 5 More European Countries
entry.summary: Crypto exchange Gemini’s expansion comes amid slumping token prices and increased regulatory scrutiny from European legislators.

entry.title: February Vote for MiCA Crypto Bill Is ‘Tentative’: European Union
entry.summary: With the landmark MiCA bill slated to be voted into law next February, a spokesperson said that this deadline could still see more delays.

entry.title: Solana Token Down Double-Digits as NFT Growth Plummets
entry.summary: The token backing the speedy layer-1 blockchain Solana has plummeted over the past 24 hours amid dwindling NFT activity.

entry.title: UK Bank Santander Will Block Payments to Crypto Exchanges
entry.summary: Citing fraud, Santander joins a minority of British banks that are tamping down on crypto investing.

entry.title: OpenSea Breaks Silence on NFT Royalties, But Creators Don't Like What They Hear
entry.summary: Creators sound the alarm after the marketplace reveals its plans, which include blacklisting rivals and potentially optional royalties.

entry.title: Success of the Open Metaverse Comes Down to User Experience: Sandbox CEO
entry.summary: While the publication of technical papers will help, OMA3 leaders say consumer adoption will be key.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Musk’s Polarizing Twitter Takeover
entry.summary: Thousands lost their jobs overnight this week without official warning. One lawyer is mounting a legal case against the Tesla CEO.

entry.title: Binance Moves to Liquidate Its Entire Position in FTX Tokens
entry.summary: CZ’s FTT dump comes after Sam Bankman-Fried stoked the ire of degens with his regulatory proposals.

entry.title: Metaplex Backtracks, Apologizes After Initially Announcing Beeple NFTs on Solana
entry.summary: Render Network and Metaplex showcased "immersive 3D NFTs" based on Beeple's work, but the artist claims no deal was ever finalized.

entry.title: Circle's Euro Stablecoin Coming to Solana in 2023
entry.summary: The Euro-backed stablecoin will launch on Solana in the first half of 2023, alongside Circle's Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol.

entry.title: Animoca Brands CEO: 'There Is No Metaverse Without Web3'
entry.summary: Robby Yung took aim at Meta's focus on virtual reality for the metaverse, calling VR "a big distraction" and "a mistake."

entry.title: Google Cloud Just Became a Solana Validator
entry.summary: Google's cloud computing services division will also bring its Blockchain Node Engine to Solana beginning in 2023.

entry.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market
entry.summary: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.

entry.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough
entry.summary: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.

entry.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.

entry.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
entry.summary: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces
entry.summary: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a metaverse."

entry.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap
entry.summary: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.

entry.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.
